item.title: Anderson.Paak - Tints (Feat.Kendrick Lamar)
item.description:
I been feelin’ kinda
cooped up cooped up
I’m tryin’ get
some fresh air
Aye why you got
the roof off roof off
You know it
never rains here
Aye you ain’t gotta
flash
When you takin’
your picture
You ain’t gotta draw
no extra attention
Paparazzi wanna
shoot ya shoot ya

for less out here
I been in my bag
adding weight
Tryin’ to throw a bag
in the safe
Giggin’ tourin’
chorin’ raisin’ babies

some bathing apes

for less out here
Do what I gotta
do bruh do bruh
Get up
in my rearview mirror
I can’t
be ridin’
Round and round
that open strip
I need tints
I need tints

that 110

in my whip

for me

for them

a xigga trollin’

fish bowlin’
